SEARCH
Package com.Software.FitnessSystem.LoginPage

Class InstructorPageControllers

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.LoginPage.InstructorPageControllers
public class InstructorPageControllers extends Object
Controls the navigation between pages for instructors in the fitness system. This class provides access to key pages such as Program Management, Client Interaction, Progress Tracking, and Notifications for instructors. The class facilitates navigation through a menu system, allowing instructors to interact with the system efficiently.
Author:
Ammar Khaled

    Description
    InstructorPageControllers()
    Constructs an instance of InstructorPageControllers and initializes all the available pages for instructor navigation.

  • Constructor Details

    • InstructorPageControllers

      public InstructorPageControllers()
      Constructs an instance of InstructorPageControllers and initializes all the available pages for instructor navigation.

  • Method Details

    • navigateToManagementPage

      public boolean navigateToManagementPage()
      Displays the main menu for the instructor and prompts the user to select an option. The user's choice determines which page they will be navigated to.
      Returns:
      true if navigation is successful.

    • navigateToPage

      public boolean navigateToPage(int page)
      Navigates to a specific page for the instructor based on the user's choice. Each option corresponds to one of the pages available to the instructor.
      Parameters:
      page - The number representing the user's choice. 1 - Program Management 2 - Client Interaction 3 - Progress Tracking 4 - Notifications and Updates 5 - Logout (returns to the Login Page) 6 - Exit (closes the program)
      Returns:
      true if navigation is successful.
